name: jillion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an extremely large, but not an exact, number: We could probably spend a jillion dollars and not solve the problem. Jillions of years ago volcanic pressure started forcing the granite slowly from beneath the ground. Synonyms
bazillion
gazillion
kazillion
squillion
zillion
More examplesFewer examplesWe get a jillion books in the mail every week, and we pick the most interesting ones to talk about. He's thinking about the next phase of his life, like a jillion other men in their 20s.The subject has already been covered approximately one jillion times.
